short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to reduce the time of logging Humatrix
short.vi: Công cụ giảm thời gian thực hiện Humatrix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each month, the Project Manager spends more than 3 hours reviewing and logging work for members. The effort in this situation is too much for the time of a Project Manager. This tool will help them to reduce that time lost to the minimum.
